summary:
Just placed a ring name Blessing of god into your inventory which gives you Unlimited Health, Magicka, Stamina, Carrying Capacity. 1000% Disease Resistance.No more need of tgm command on console.
You can also give this ring to your follower making them immortal and much more powerful.

Updated to Version 2

Now Lower Level Players can use mast
descriptionHtml:
Just placed a ring name Blessing of god into your inventory which gives you Unlimited Health ,Magicka, Stamina, Carrying Capacity, 1000% Disease Resistance. No more need of tgm command on console.

You can also give this ring to your follower making them immortal and much more powerful.

Updated to Version 2

Now Lower Level Players can use master level spells.

New 2 Rings added

1.Ring Of NightEye
which give you night eye effect for as much time as you wish and all the effect of blessing of god

2.Ring Of Water Walking
Walk On water now and be a god.

New Deadly  1 Hit kill Weapon named Divines Blade added near guardians stones.

Remember this is very powerful weapon it can kill almost anything in 1 shot and plus no recharge is required. so use it as long as  you enjoy it.

You Can Buy all the items in RiverWood Traders From Lucan Valerius.

                 OR
                      
Forge the above items in any blacksmith forge.

If you want all dragon shouts then download my another mod Blessing of Akatosh..
author: Praveen
